rules_text: Search your library for up to ten land cards, reveal them, and shuffle them into a new face-down library.
flavor_text:
[i]“On the three seas, each day can be a mission, or an adventure, or a vacation! A pirate's life is what you make it. Make it the best you can.”
—First mate Harriet of the [/i]Pioneer[i][/i]
notes: !rul Use the `$shuffle 10` command to randomize additional libraries.
